items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the length member of the NodeList API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/NodeList/length
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.NodeList.length

items.content_html:

items.content_html:

items.title: Add Safari versions for MediaEncryptedEvent API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for all browsers for the FileReader API. The data for the events was copied from their event handler counterparts. Data for the other features was mirrored from Chrome to Chrome Android and Samsung Internet. Finally, any mentions of Safari 6.1 was corrected to Safari 7, since we are removing the 6.1 backport data.
items.title: Add all browsers versions for FileReader API

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the CloseEvent member of the CloseEvent API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/CloseEvent/CloseEvent
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.CloseEvent.CloseEvent

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for all browsers for the Document API. The data was copied from their matching event handlers (such as in GlobalEventHandlers).
items.title: Add all browsers versions for Document API

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc API, based upon commit history and date.

Commit: https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/4cb6a26d8b06a60da0e7460eedb5034d5d25ae30
items.title: Add Chromium versions for WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc API
